title: Catholic Classics - 19 books (epub, mobi)
description:
19 Catholic books that are either true classics or near-classics. All are epub and mobi; most are from a retail source, usually Penguin Classics. Several (Newman and Adam) are good quality amateur versions. I've added high resolution calibre covers to many of them, especially the Penguins. They all include calibre covers and metadata for easy import.


St. Augustine - The Confessions (John K. Ryan, trans.)

-- The City of God (Henry Bettenson, trans.)

John Henry Newman - Callista
-- An Essay on the Development of Christian Doctrine
-- An Essay in Aid of a Grammar of Assent
-- Apologia Pro Vita Sua

Boethius - The Consolation of Philosophy (Victor Watts, trans.)

Benedicta Ward, ed. - The Desert Fathers: Sayings of the Early Christian Monks

Eusebius - The History of the Church (G. A. Williamson, trans.)

Thomas a Kempis - The Imitation of Christ (Robert Jeffery, trans.)

St. Anselm - Prayers and Meditations, with the Proslogion (Benedicta Ward, trans.)

St. Thomas Aquinas - Selected Writings (Ralph McInerny, ed.)

Meister Eckhart - Selected Writings (Oliver Davies, ed.)

St. Hildegard of Bingen - Selected Writings (Mark Atherton, trans.)

M. Eugune Boylan - This Tremendous Lover

Julian of Norwich - Revelations of Divine Love (Simon Parke, trans.)

Karl Adam - The Spirit of Catholicism

Dietrich von Hildebrand - Transformation in Christ

St. Ignatius of Loyola - Personal Writings (Joseph A. Munitiz and Philip Endean, eds.)

---

Many thanks to the original uploaders.
